alert.note: Alert for Adair; Grundy; Linn; Mercer; Putnam; Sullivan (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 17 at 4:53PM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Adair, northwestern Linn, northeastern Grundy, Sullivan, southeastern Mercer and southwestern Putnam Counties through 545 PM CDT... At 452 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Galt, or 8 miles west of Milan, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Milan, Green City, Greencastle, Browning, Galt, Purdin, Newtown, Humphreys, Pollock, Harris, Osgood, Reger and Green Castle. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for north central and northeastern Missouri.

area.areaDesc: Adair; Grundy; Linn; Mercer; Putnam; Sullivan
